resources.string: 40 years ago, only 1 in 4 people survived Cancer...
...Today, we have a 2 in 4 chance of beating Cancer...
...but, we want to quicken the pace!
We want you to help raise money for Cancer Research Uk with a little donation everytime you swear!
Swear Jar will monitor your texts and make a small donation to Cancer Research Uk everytime you write something naughty...
...Swear Jar also knows when you use some fruity language on a phone call!
...Having a night on the town or just a few down at your local? Swear Jar will also monitor your location and donate a little money whenever you\'re spending money on booze
All of your donations go to Cancer Research UK, together we will beat Cancer
